messages.message: Hi @Arjun. This is interesting. Having the ground truths, would it make sense to think about a tool that would "optimize" the prompts to try to improve the results fo the fields, helping the developers to find the "best prompt"?
Yes @fernando.piazza.ctr this is definitely something we plan on exploring in Q4+! When you get a chance would definitely love your feedback on the current capabilities!

Solution accuracy is one of the most requested features - we'd love to get all of your feedback before we GA!

Please help us test @Venkatesh @BG @Dale DeLoy @Hamish @Tom Murphy @david.lee @Anshu @Pramod Munemanik and everyone else :pray:

Looking forward to getting your feedback!
